meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rabid.
meanings.sent1: The rabidnesses of the dog scared the children.
meanings.sent2: The rabidnesses of the virus spread quickly through the population.
meanings.sent3: The rabidnesses of the squirrel trying to steal the birdseed was comical.
meanings.sent4: Her rabidnesses for collecting stamps knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The rabidnesses of the storm made everyone seek shelter immediately.

meanings.definition: The intense or fanatical nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The rabidnesses of his support for the team was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: The rabidnesses of her dedication to her work was admirable.
meanings.sent3: His rabidnesses for eating ice cream every day was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The rabidnesses of the crowd's excitement filled the stadium.
meanings.sent5: The rabidnesses of her love for music was evident in every note she played.
